examples: He rode his bike to work every day.
I need to buy a new bike helmet.
Él iba en bicicleta al trabajo todos los días.
Necesito comprar un nuevo casco de bicicleta.

suggested: Why did the bike fall over? It was two-tired!
The abandoned bike leaned against the wall, a silent reminder of happier days.
I can't believe someone stole my bike! It was my only mode of transportation.
Did you know that the fastest bicycle speed ever recorded is 167 mph?
The sound of the spokes whirring as the bike picked up speed.
The wind in your hair and the sun on your face as you ride your bike on a beautiful day.
Remember the joy of getting your first bike as a kid? It's a feeling that never goes away.
